UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the ChitraGupt application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

AuditorProfile.title: AuditorProfile
AuditorProfile.description: Represents the public-facing profile of an auditor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the auditor (matches their UID).

avatarUrl.description: URL for the auditor's avatar image.

firm.description: The auditor's firm or if they are independent.

specialization.description: The auditor's areas of legal specialization.

Contract.title: Contract
Contract.description: Represents a contract uploaded to the ChitraGupt application.

uploadDate.description: Date and time when the contract was uploaded.

documentName.description: The file name of the uploaded contract.

analysisReportId.description: Reference to the AIAnalysisReport. (Relationship: Contract 1:1 AIAnalysisReport)

AIAnalysisReport.title: AIAnalysisReport
AIAnalysisReport.description: Represents the AI analysis report generated for a contract.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AI analysis report.

summary.description: Summary of the contract generated by AI.

riskScore.description: Risk score of the contract generated by AI.

missingClauses.description: List of missing clauses identified by AI.

AuditorFeedback.title: AuditorFeedback
AuditorFeedback.description: Represents feedback provided by an auditor on a contract.

id.description: Unique identifier for the auditor feedback.

feedbackText.description: Textual feedback provided by the auditor.

approvalStatus.description: Approval status of the contract by the auditor (e.g., approved, rejected, needs revision).

Annotation.title: Annotation
Annotation.description: Represents annotations on a contract by an auditor.

position.description: The position of annotation in contract.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. The userId is the Firebase Auth UID. This path enables path-based ownership for security rules.

/auditors/{auditorId}.description: Stores public-facing information for auditors. This collection can be read by any authenticated user, but only written to by the auditor themselves or an admin.

/users/{userId}/contracts/{contractId}.description: Stores contracts uploaded by users. The userId parameter ensures that only the owner can access the contract (path-based ownership).

/users/{userId}/contracts/{contractId}/a.description: Stores AI analysis reports for each contract. The structure maintains a clear hierarchy and ensures path-based ownership.
Stores auditor feedback for each contract. The structure maintains a clear hierarchy and ensures that only authorized auditors can add feedback.
Stores annotations made by auditors on specific contracts.  The structure ensures that annotations are directly linked to a contract and an auditor.
